name: Them's Fightin' Herds
description: Them’s Fightin’ Herds is an indie 2D fighting game featuring a cast of adorable animals designed by acclaimed cartoon producer Lauren Faust. Beneath the cute and cuddly surface, a mechanically-deep GGPO-powered fighter awaits!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual-core CPU (2 GHz or greater speed) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel Core i3 550 Integrated graphics chipset or equivalent. DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1 or 10 Processor: Dual-core CPU (2 GHz or greater speed) Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: A dedicated GPU (Nvidia or AMD) with at least 750MB of VRAM strongly recommended DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
